amendment.description: Amendments make various technical and clarifying changes; provide for the establishment of the Great Lakes Pilotage Advisory Committee; clarify the liability of persons engaging in oil spill prevention and response activities; convey the Ocracoke Coast Guard Station to the State of North Carolina; convey Coast Guard property in Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan to the American Legion in Sault Sainte Marie; and allow certain vessels into coastwise trade.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, consisting of several amendments offered en bloc, to make technical corrections to the bill.

action.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
